idea:
Itvedant was started with the aim of bridging the gap between education and skills needed for the job. We commit you to be an expert in your field. Faculties are experts with Industry Experience. We train all our students based on industry mechanism and focus on Projects. Practice makes man perfect, so we deliver 80% practical knowledge which will help to boost your CAREER & Empower yourself for a better job.

Our syllabus covers important aspects which help to stand out of the box. To understand each and every concept from vivid angles notes, PPT slides, online knowledge-base, sample projects, resume and interviews preparation sessions, mock interview are provided. Our motive is to make Foundation so strong that you can cope up with new trends in future.
name: ITVEDANT EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

With experience & knowledge encompassing a wide range of Business and Financial services, CoKaCo empowers organizations and Individuals to concentrate on their core business by ensuring them with tailor made solutions with innovative acumen and client centric approach to have long term synergistic alliances for business growth.
name: NNM NEXTGEN ADVISORY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are valuation, legal, real estate advisory, advisory services for Land Matters (For Maharashtra State) and consulting firm headquartered in Mumbai, with multiple offices in various parts of Mumbai, MMRDA and at PAN India level.

We have regional offices at Delhi, Kolkata, Chennai & other metropolitan cities.

We provide services at PAN India level.

Following is the brief profile of the services that we offer:

Valuation Services:

 Business Valuation

 Valuation of Brands, Intangible Assets & Intellectual Property

 Valuation of Financial Securities, Instruments & Derivatives

 Valuation of Industrial Assets, Plant & Machinery

 Valuation of Real Estate

 Valuation of Infrastructure Assets & Specialized Assets

 Purchase Price Allocations for Mergers & Acquisitions

 Impairment Studies for Tangible Assets

 Impairment Studies for Intangible Assets & Goodwill

 Mines, Mineral Advisory and Valuation

 Valuation of ESOPs and Sweat Equity

 Valuation for Tax, Transfer Pricing and Company Law Matters

 Fairness Opinions


Legal Services:

 Arbitration Services (Drafting, Pleading & Claim preparation)

 Intellectual property service/In House IP attorney

 Contract drafting & management

 Legal Affidavits

 Property related title/legal search reports

 Legal Due Diligence

 Advisors Land Revenue Code

 Corporate law


Real Estate Advisory Services:

 Real Estate & Infrastructure Advisory Services.

 Provisioning of land parcels/building premises throughout India. (Agricultural/Industrial/Commercial).

 Provisioning of project finance from financial institutions.

 Documentation for complete transaction.

 Consultancy on Govt. procedures, clearances on real estate and infrastructure inventories.

 Maharashtra State – Consultancy for all land revenue related matters. (eg: acquisition, title rehabilitation, etc.)


Advisory Services for Land Matters (for Maharashtra State):

 Record of rights

 Tenancy matters

 Agricultural to Non Agricultural Land Conversions

 Allotment of Govt Land for Rehabilitation

 Mining Orders

 Solvency certificate

 Agricultural certificate

 Evacuees property

 MLRC 1966, Sec 143 work

 MMRDA Office work

 Compensation payment for different projects

 Tribal to tribal land sale permission

 Samrudhi super communication express related work

 National high speed Rail matters

 Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train

 Dedicated front corridor (DFC) work

 NAVI MUMBAI MUNCIPAL Corp. /TMC/BMC Offices work

 MLRC 84 CC WORK19.70B/32G/32M Tenancy work

 Layout/plotting work

 Encroachment matters

 SRA Schemes

 GST and Income Tax matters

And Many more govt related work.
name: AADDAPS ADVANTS LLP
